name: Game Night with UNCRFP
description: Join the Russian Flagship Program for a virtual game night on Zoom! Test out your knowledge of the culture and history of Russia and other Russian-speaking countries.

name: Russian Flagship Trivia Night
description: Join the Russian Flagship Program for a fun night of trivia and test your knowledge on Russian geography, history, culture, language and more! Prizes available for our winners!

name: Russian Movie Night
description: UNCRFP is hosting a Russian movie night! The choice of Russian film is yours, we will be hosting a poll on our Instagram story (@uncrfp) on July 8th. The winning movie will be watched together over Zoom on Tuesday, July 13th. Увидимся там!
